properties.name: directives
properties.description: List of {@link QueryParamAccessor} registered to this service.
properties.rawdescription: List of {@link QueryParamAccessor} registered to this service.

properties.name: queue$
properties.description:
Queue of navigation parameters

A queue is used for navigations as we need to make sure all parameter changes are executed in sequence as otherwise navigations might overwrite each other.
properties.rawdescription:
Queue of navigation parameters

A queue is used for navigations as we need to make sure all parameter changes
are executed in sequence as otherwise navigations might overwrite each other.

methods.name: deregisterQueryParamDirective
methods.rawdescription: Deregisters a {@link QueryParamAccessor} by referencing its name.
methods.description: Deregisters a {@link QueryParamAccessor} by referencing its name.

methods.name: enqueueNavigation
methods.rawdescription: Sends a change of parameters to the queue.
methods.description: Sends a change of parameters to the queue.

methods.name: getParamsForValue
methods.rawdescription:
Returns the full set of parameters given a value for a parameter model.

This consists mainly of properly serializing the model value and ensuring to take
side effect changes into account that may have been configured.
methods.description:
Returns the full set of parameters given a value for a parameter model.

This consists mainly of properly serializing the model value and ensuring to take side effect changes into account that may have been configured.

methods.name: isSyntheticNavigation
methods.rawdescription: Returns true if the current navigation is synthetic.
methods.description: Returns true if the current navigation is synthetic.

methods.name: setQueryParamGroup
methods.rawdescription: Uses the given {@link QueryParamGroup} for synchronization.

methods.name: setupGroupChangeListener
methods.rawdescription: Listens for programmatic changes on group level and synchronizes to the router.
methods.description: Listens for programmatic changes on group level and synchronizes to the router.

methods.name: setupNavigationQueue
methods.rawdescription: Subscribes to the parameter queue and executes navigations in sequence.
methods.description: Subscribes to the parameter queue and executes navigations in sequence.

methods.name: setupParamChangeListeners
methods.rawdescription: Listens for programmatic changes on parameter level and synchronizes to the router.
methods.description: Listens for programmatic changes on parameter level and synchronizes to the router.

methods.name: setupRouterListener
methods.rawdescription: Listens for changes in the router and synchronizes to the model.
methods.description: Listens for changes in the router and synchronizes to the model.

methods.name: watchNewParams
methods.rawdescription: Listens for newly added parameters and starts synchronization for them.
methods.description: Listens for newly added parameters and starts synchronization for them.

injectables.description:
Service implementing the synchronization logic

This service is the key to the synchronization process by binding a {@link QueryParamGroup} to the router.

getSignature.name: routerOptions
getSignature.rawdescription:
Returns the current set of options to pass to the router.

This merges the global configuration with the group specific configuration.
getSignature.description:
Returns the current set of options to pass to the router.

This merges the global configuration with the group specific configuration.

classes.name: NavigationData

directives.name: BarDirective
FooDirective
QueryParamNameDirective
directives.description:
Binds a {@link QueryParam} to a DOM element.

This directive accepts the name of a {@link QueryParam} inside its parent {@link QueryParamGroup}. It binds this parameter to the host element, which is required to have a [ControlValueAccessor] {@link https://angular.io/api/forms/ControlValueAccessor}.
directives.rawdescription:
Binds a {@link QueryParam} to a DOM element.

This directive accepts the name of a {@link QueryParam} inside its parent {@link QueryParamGroup}.
It binds this parameter to the host element, which is required to have a [ControlValueAccessor]
{@link https://angular.io/api/forms/ControlValueAccessor}.

inputsClass.name: queryParamName
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The name of the {@link QueryParam} inside its parent {@link QueryParamGroup}.
Note that this does not refer to the [parameter name]{@link QueryParam#urlParam}.
inputsClass.description: The name of the {@link QueryParam} inside its parent {@link QueryParamGroup}. Note that this does not refer to the [parameter name]{@link QueryParam#urlParam}.

directives.name: TestClass
directives.description:
Test class for JSDoc Example language specification

Example :
// TypeScript example
const instance = new TestClass();
___COMPODOC_EMPTY_LINE___
// Calling the test method
instance.testMethod();
Example :
<!-- HTML example -->
<div>Hello World</div>
Example :
// JavaScript example
const result = testFunction();

methodsClass.name: testMethod
methodsClass.description:
Test method with examples

Example :
// Method usage
const test = new TestClass();
test.testMethod();

jsdoctags.comment:
Example :
// Method usage
const test = new TestClass();
test.testMethod();
